Name: Ermelinda
description:
Ermelina, 23 years old and single, lives in her motherâ€™s house, which is located in the Nueva Libertad Village, Tabaconas, Cajamarca, where she makes a living from cultivating special coffee that she sells in a local cooperative.

Ermelinda will use the loan to buy fertilizers and to pay wages for weeding the coffee plantation.
